Export.Routine:
INWER #include INConst #include COMSYS /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; WAREN RESERVIERUNG ; Reserve Goods ; ; Inputs : ; YKEY ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 26-Feb-2007 GRF SR15456: Stop second "OnAfterSave" call being processed ; if form is reloaded ("Sticker" button needs to use ; browser back arrow); Class Macros ; 13-Nov-2006 GRF SR15216: Remove FIXME (done); !=>||; doco ; 05-Apr-2006 GRF Doco ; 01.Oct.2001 FAN Created ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ NEW ART,BET,LAP,WED,INWE1,MNG
QUIT:$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",1)="" SET ART = $PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",1) ;ARTIKEL ; Item QUIT:$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",2)="" SET BET = $PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",2) ;BETRIEB ; Site Location QUIT:$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",3)="" SET LAP = $PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",3) ;LAGER ; Stock Location QUIT:$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",4)="" SET WED = $PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",4) ;WEDATUM ; Date QUIT:$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",5)="" SET RENR = $PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",5) ;RESERVIERUNGS NR ; Reservation Number
quit:$$^WWWRELOAD() ; SR15456
;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; INWER1 objReserve Reservation ; D4 $$$INWERLaybyQuantity() ; D10 $$$INWERQuantity() ; ; INWE1 objOnHand Quantity On Hand ; D4 $$$INWEQuantity() ; D37 $$$INWETotalReservedQuantity() ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
SET INWER1=$GET(^INWER(YM,ART,BET,LAP,WED,RENR,1)) QUIT:INWER1=""
SET INWE1=$GET(^INWE(YM,ART,BET,LAP,WED,1)) QUIT:INWE1=""
if ($$$INWERLaybyQuantity(INWER1)'>0) || ($$$INWERLaybyQuantity(INWER1)>($$$INWEQuantity(INWE1))) { DO LOST DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(32292)_" ("_$$^WWWTEXT(31407)_")") ; "Check Please ! (Quantity) SET Q=1 } elseif ($$$INWERHoldUntilDate(INWER1)'="") && ($$$INWERHoldUntilDate(INWER1)<$HOROLOG) { DO LOST DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(32292)_" ("_$$^WWWTEXT(124)_")") ; "Check Please ! (Date) SET Q=1 } else { DO RESER } QUIT
LOST ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Cancel the save if an error occurs by deleting the saved record. ; SHOULD be onBeforeSave validation! ; ; LÖSCHEN DATENSATZ BEI ERSSTMAL ERFASSUNGEN ;Delete data record next to ; No Qty ; ; FIXME : Does this leave zero (i.e. non zero) values still present? <GRF> ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF $$$INWERQuantity(INWER1)="" DO . KILL ^INWER(YM,ART,BET,LAP,WED,RENR) . DO ^WWWSKILL("INWER",ART_","_BET_","_LAP_","_WED_","_RENR)
QUIT
RESER ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Add to Reservation ;RESERVIERUNG ANLEGEN ; INWER D10 IST FÜR ÄNDERUNG GEDACHT. ;to alteration ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 26-Feb-2007 GRF SR15456: uncomment line to increment INWE Reserved Qty. ; 21-Aug-2006 GRF SR15216: Add Audit as 8th parameter to INARTHIST call ; 09-Nov-2006 PO SR15209: Log SOH movement before and after ; 23-Aug-2006 JW SR14934: INARTHIST call should be information only. ; 05-Jul-2006 Pablo SRBR014077: Update the INARTHISTL global with the quantity deleted ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW TEXT
;UMBUCHEN ;rebook SET $$$INWETotalReservedQuantity(INWE1) = $$$INWETotalReservedQuantity(INWE1) + $$$INWERLaybyQuantity(INWER1) ; SR15456 SET $$$INWEQuantity(INWE1) = $$$INWEQuantity(INWE1) - $$$INWERLaybyQuantity(INWER1)
if $get(^SysSetup(15209,"BOR")) do Log^INReservationHistory($$$INWERQuantity(INWER1), ART, BET, LAP, WED, $$$YES, "BOR", RENR) // SR15209
DO . NEW KEY,YFORM,YVOR . SET KEY=ART_","_BET_","_LAP_","_WED . SET OK=$$^WWWSPEI("INWE",KEY,INWE1,1)
if $get(^SysSetup(15209,"BOR")) do Log^INReservationHistory($$$INWERQuantity(INWER1), ART, BET, LAP, WED, $$$NO, "BOR", RENR) // SR15209
; Reserved for unknown person ;Reservieren für XXXX ? if ($$$INWERForCustomer(INWER1)="") && ($$$INWEROrForAddress(INWER1)="") && ($$$INWEROrForOffer(INWER1)="") && ($$$INWEROrForPerson(INWER1)="") && ($$$INWEROrForOrder(INWER1)="") { set $$$INWEROrForPerson(INWER1)="?" set $$$INWEROrForPerson(^INWER(YM,ART,BET,LAP,WED,RENR,1))="?" }
; "Customer"/"Customer"/"Order"/"Offer"/"Others" ; (Address) (Person) SET TEXT=""
set idDetail = $$$INWERForCustomer(INWER1) if idDetail'="" set TEXT=$$^WWWTEXT(32231)_": ("_idDetail_") "_$PIECE($GET(^INKUNDE(YM,idDetail,1)),Y,8)
set idDetail = $$$INWEROrForAddress(INWER1) if idDetail'="" set TEXT=$$^WWWTEXT(32669)_": ("_idDetail_") "_$PIECE($GET(^INWERBADR(YM,idDetail,1)),Y,8)
set idDetail = $$$INWEROrForOrder(INWER1) if idDetail'="" set TEXT=$$^WWWTEXT(32047)_": ("_idDetail_") "_$PIECE($GET(^INAUF1(YM,idDetail,1)),Y,1)
set idDetail = $$$INWEROrForOffer(INWER1) if idDetail'="" set TEXT=$$^WWWTEXT(32169)_": ("_idDetail_") "_$PIECE($GET(^INANG1(YM,idDetail,1)),Y,1)
set idDetail = $$$INWEROrForPerson(INWER1) if idDetail'="" set TEXT=$$^WWWTEXT(32347)_": "_idDetail
; "Reserved For ###" ;Z.B. RESERVIERT FÜR KUNDE 55(TEU) set TEXT=$$^WWWTEXT(32480)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(32807)_" "_TEXT set TEXT=TEXT_" / "_ART_" / "_BET_" / "_LAP_" / "_$$^WWWDATE(WED)_" / "_RENR // SRBR014077
;do Information^INARTHIST(ART,TEXT,BET,,$$$INWERLaybyQuantity(INWER1),,LAP) // SR14934: Don't post to FIN do Information^INARTHIST(ART,TEXT,BET,,$$$INWERLaybyQuantity(INWER1),,LAP,"RESER^INWER") ; SR15216
QUIT
AUS(ART,BET,LAP,WED,RENR,VON) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; RESERVIERUNG AUFLÖSEN -> AUFRUF ; ; Cancel a reservation if the HoldUntilDate is past ; ; Called By : ; Routines - INAUFWH, WER^INTAGES6, INWERES, INWERMENGE ; Buttons on form INWER (obsolete?) ; ; Params: ; ART - Item Id ; BET - Site Location ; LAP - Stock Location ; WED - Receipt Date ; RENR - Reservation Id ; VON - What cancelled the reservation - e.g. text 33557 "System" ; ; ByRefs: None ; ; Returns: Nothing ; ; History: ; 26-Feb-2007 GRF SR15456: Class Macros; obj* variables ; 21-Aug-2006 GRF SR15216: Add Audit as 8th parameter to INARTHIST call ; 09-Nov-2006 PO SR15209: Log SOH movement before and after ; 23-Aug-2006 JW SR14934: INARTHIST call should be information only. ; 06-Jul-2006 PO SR14669: When the reservation is cancelled and the ; reservation quantity is added back to SOH the reserved ; quantity is now also removed from the Total Reserved Quantity. ; 05-Jul-2006 Pablo SRBR014077: Update the INARTHISTL global with the quantity deleted ; 04.08.2003 FAN 24045 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new INWE1,objOnHand,objReserve,TEXT
IF ($GET(RENR)="") || ($GET(WED)="") || ($GET(LAP)="") || ($GET(BET)="") || ($GET(ART)="") DO QUIT . IF YFORM'="INWER" QUIT . SET %("VAR","YFORM")="INWER" . DO ^WWWFORM
SET objReserve=$GET(^INWER(YM,ART,BET,LAP,WED,RENR,1)) IF (objReserve="") || ($$$INWERReservationcancledAt(objReserve)'="") DO QUIT ;IF BEREITS AUFGELÖST, DENN IST NICHT MEHR ZURÜCKBUCHEN. . IF YFORM'="INWER" QUIT . SET %("VAR","YFORM")="INWER" . DO ^WWWFORM
SET objOnHand = $GET(^INWE(YM,ART,BET,LAP,WED,1)) ;FIS;02.01.04;RESERVIERUNG IMMER AUFLÖSEN ! ;constantly undo
if $get(^SysSetup(15209,"BOR")) do Log^INReservationHistory($$$INWERQuantity(objReserve), ART, BET, LAP, WED, $$$YES, "CBR", RENR) // SR15209
;UMBUCHEN ;rebook set $$$INWETotalReservedQuantity(objOnHand) = $$$INWETotalReservedQuantity(objOnHand) - $$$INWERLaybyQuantity(objReserve) ; SR14669 set $$$INWEQuantity(objOnHand) = $$$INWEQuantity(objOnHand) + $$$INWERLaybyQuantity(objReserve)
DO . NEW KEY,YFORM,YVOR . SET KEY=ART_","_BET_","_LAP_","_WED . SET OK=$$^WWWSPEI("INWE",KEY,objOnHand,1)
SET $$$INWERReservationcancledAt(objReserve) = +$HOROLOG ;AUFGELÖST AM SET $$$INWERReservationCancledBy(objReserve) = $GET(VON) ;AUFGELÖST VON DO . NEW KEY,YFORM,YVOR . SET KEY=ART_","_BET_","_LAP_","_WED_","_RENR . SET YOK=$$^WWWSPEI("INWER",KEY,objReserve,1)
if $get(^SysSetup(15209,"BOR")) do Log^INReservationHistory($$$INWERQuantity(objReserve), ART, BET, LAP, WED, $$$NO, "CBR", RENR) // SR15209
; "Undo Layby" ;MENGE reserviert AUFLÖSEN SET TEXT=$$^WWWTEXT(33066)_" / "_ART_" / "_BET_" / "_LAP_" / "_$$^WWWDATE(WED)_" ("_$GET(VON)_") / "_RENR // SRBR014077
;do Information^INARTHIST(ART,TEXT,BET,$$$INWERLaybyQuantity(objReserve),,,LAP) // SR14934: Don't post to FIN do Information^INARTHIST(ART,TEXT,BET,$$$INWERLaybyQuantity(objReserve),,,LAP,"AUS^INWER") ; SR15216
IF YFORM="INWER" DO . DO ^INWERLIST($PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",1),$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",2),$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",3),$PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",4))
QUIT
